articles.title: Udaipur killing: Two more arrested; Rath Yatra procession taken out amid heavy police deployment
articles.description: The Special Operations Group and the ATS of the Rajasthan Police issued a statement saying media reports claiming that the NIA said there was no terrorist organisation's hand in the killing were “premature” because the investigation is in a preliminary stage.
articles.content: The Rajasthan Police on Friday arrested two more accused for the murder of Udaipur-based tailor Kanhaiya Lal on June 28, with officials saying they were involved in the conspiracy to plan and execute… [+4959 chars]

articles.title: Delhi Police Adds New Charges Against Fact-Checker Mohammed Zubair
articles.description: The Delhi Police has added fresh charges against Mohammed Zubair, the co-founder of fact-checking site Alt News who was arrested in a case related to an alleged objectionable tweet in 2018.
articles.content:
Mohammed Zubair was arrested by the Delhi Police on June 27 for allegedly hurting religious sentiments.
